channel.title: NBA To Go Video
channel.description: Video Feeds for NBA To Go

item.title: Pacers End Loss Streak, Defeat Celtics
item.description: David West scores 24 points, Paul George adds 12 points as the Pacers end their four-game skid defeating the Celtics.
item.player: David West, Paul George, Lance Stephenson, Andrew Bynum, Rajon Rondo, Kelly Olynyk, Jeff Green
item.tags: Indiana, Pacers, Boston, Celtics, game, recap, David West, Paul George, Lance Stephenson, Andrew Bynum, Rajon Rondo, Kelly Olynyk, Jeff Green

item.title: Smith Leads Pistons Past Kings
item.description: Josh Smith records a game-high 24 points to lead the Pistons over the Kings to end their three-game skid.
item.player: Josh Smith, Andre Drummond, Greg Monroe, Kyle Singler, Brandon Jennings, Rodney Stuckey, DeMarcus Cousins, Isaiah Thomas, Rudy Gay
item.tags: Detroit, Pistons, Sacramento, Kings, game, recap, Josh Smith, Andre Drummond, Greg Monroe, Kyle Singler, Brandon Jennings, Rodney Stuckey, DeMarcus Cousins, Isaiah Thomas, Rudy Gay

item.title: Spurs Hang on to Defeat Bulls
item.description: Manu Ginobili scores 22 points as the Spurs hang on to defeat the Bulls despite only 14 fourth-quarter points.
item.player: Manu Ginobili, Tony Parker, Jimmy Butler, Joakim Noah, D.J. Augustin, Marco Belinelli, Patty Mills, Kawhi Leonard
item.tags: Chicago, Bulls, San Antonio, Spurs, game, recap, Manu Ginobili, Tony Parker, Jimmy Butler, Joakim Noah, D.J. Augustin, Marco Belinelli, Patty Mills, Kawhi Leonard

item.title: Grizzlies Edge Blazers
item.description: Marc Gasol scores 19 points, Zach Randolph adds a double-double as the Grizzlies defeat the Blazers.
item.player: Marc Gasol, Zach Randolph, Courtney Lee, Mike Conley, Mike Miller, LaMarcus Aldridge, Nicolas Batum, Damian Lillard
item.tags: Memphis, Grizzlies, Portland, Trail Blazers, game, recap, Marc Gasol, Zach Randolph, Courtney Lee, Mike Conley, Mike Miller, LaMarcus Aldridge, Nicolas Batum, Damian Lillard
